Name: The Evil of Mutant
About the game: The free scenario RPG that you create ■ Basic scenario Something is wrong with this world... At first glance, it looks the same as usual...a peaceful daily routine... But...the world...something is wrong... When I realized the 'truth'...the world was already in its 'end'... You are the one chosen to save the world See the world. Travel the world and get knowledges and experience. There, learn people, worry about society, and encounter life crises. Every experience makes you stronger. Change the fate of the world. ■ Game system ·battle Each hero can use 'normal attack', 'magic', and 'special skill'. “Magic” can be purchased at the shop, and can also be obtained by defeating enemies. 'Special skills' were depending on the heroes. When facing a strong enemy, devising the role of the heroes is the point of strategy. ・ Help items when fighting enemies is troublesome A 'stealth machine' that will not be encountered for 300 steps. A 'battle skip ticket' that allows you to skip a battle with an enemy you've defeated once. You can buy these two at the shop. ・Free scenario You are free, from the moment you leave the royal castle. Go where you want to go and do what you want to do. If you get lost in too much freedom, Paris City's 'Magician' will show you the way. ・ Equipment that gets stronger as you strengthen It seems that somewhere in this world, there are 'Evolution Sword', 'Evolution Shield', 'Evolution Helmet', and 'Evolution Armor'. Unlike normal equipment, it becomes stronger the more you strengthen it. Collect 'Strenold' and strengthen your Evolution Equipment. ・New game with Cleared data This game has multiple endings. It is possible to play from the beginning while being strong without wasting the elements that have been raised.
